name: CreepyCraft
description:
Story: 

Steve found a seemingly abandoned village. Or so you think? Well, a zombie is hanging around the village and he's highly dangerous. Steve must activate a portal to the nether and destroy the spawn.


Controls:

WSAD - MOVE
SHIFT - RUN
C - SHOW MAP
E - INTERACT
R CLICK - TURN FLASHLIGTH ON/OFF (completly useless)
